data.question: How can I buy time with a famous person?
data.answer: To buy time with a celebrity, simply choose the person of interest from our catalog, select the appropriate time package, and follow the payment instructions. After that, you can schedule a meeting and start communicating!

data.question: Which celebrities are available on your platform?
data.answer: We collaborate with a wide range of celebrities from various fields: from business tycoons and industry leaders to actors, athletes, and musicians. Our catalog is constantly updated, so don't forget to check for the availability of your idol!
